text: (Say) to them, O Muhammad: (Lo! my Lord enlargeth the provision for whom He will of His bondmen) as a lure to perdition, (and narroweth (it) for him) out of care for him. (And whatsoever ye spend (for good)) in the way of Allah (He replaceth it) in the life of this world with wealth and in the Hereafter with rewards. (And He is the Best of Providers) He is the Best Giver and the Best Replacer.
